liver.description: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits.
liver.lesion: hyperechoic lesion measuring 1.5 x 1.1 x 1.9 cm in segment V of the liver.

bile_ducts.description: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation.

gallbladder.description: The gallbladder is mildly distended with multiple gallstones.
gallbladder.pericholecystic_fluid: There is a small sliver of pericholecystic fluid.
gallbladder.sonographic_sign: No definitive sonographic ___ sign was elicited.

pancreas.description: Imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation.
pancreas.limitations: Portions of the pancreatic tail obscured by overlying bowel gas.
